data.comment: It is reported that 10743 spectators are in attendance today.
The first-half is now underway.
CSKA Moscow take a 0-1 lead thanks to Fedor Chalov.
In the minute 2, Great play from Nikola Vlasic to set up the goal.
Chidera Ejuke gets his shot on target but fails to score for CSKA Moscow.
Throw-in for CSKA Moscow at Rostov Arena.
In the minute 4, Rostov to take a throw-in in CSKA Moscow territory.
Rostov drive upfield and Mathias Normann gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a CSKA Moscow defender.
Vladimir Moskalev signals a free kick to Rostov just outside CSKA Moscow's area.
In the minute 5, At Rostov Arena, Ilzat Akhmetov has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Rostov's Roman Eremenko gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Vladimir Moskalev awards CSKA Moscow a goal kick.
In the minute 8, Rostov will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from CSKA Moscow.
In Rostov-on-Don CSKA Moscow drive forward through Ilzat Akhmetov. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Vladimir Moskalev signals a free kick to Rostov.
In the minute 9, Attention is being given to Rostov’s Mathias Normann and play has been suspended briefly.
Rostov's Mathias Normann looks ok and returns to the pitch.
Throw-in for CSKA Moscow in their own half.
In the minute 12, Free kick in a good position for Rostov!
Throw-in CSKA Moscow.
Ball safe as Rostov is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 14, Vladimir Moskalev awards the home team a throw-in.
Danila Sukhomlinov (Rostov) has replaced the possibly injured Mathias Normann at Rostov Arena.
CSKA Moscow needs to be cautious. Rostov have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 15, CSKA Moscow awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Can CSKA Moscow get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Rostov's half?
Vladimir Moskalev awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 19, Throw-in high up the field for CSKA Moscow in Rostov-on-Don.
Rostov awarded a free kick in their own half.
Vladimir Moskalev signals a throw-in for Rostov, close to CSKA Moscow's area.
In the minute 20, Rostov's Roman Eremenko is on target but unsuccessful.
CSKA Moscow are coming forward and Nayair Tiknizyan gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Rostov-on-Don.
In the minute 22, Rostov's Danila Sukhomlinov gets in a shot on goal at Rostov Arena. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Vladimir Moskalev signals a free kick to CSKA Moscow in their own half.
Rostov are pushing forward but Khoren Bayramyan's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 24, CSKA Moscow have a goal kick.
CSKA Moscow's Fedor Chalov misses with an attempt on goal.
Goal kick for Rostov at Rostov Arena.
In the minute 26, Free kick for CSKA Moscow in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Rostov goal kick.
Free kick for CSKA Moscow in their own half.
In the minute 30, Vladimir Moskalev signals a CSKA Moscow throw-in in Rostov's half.
Fedor Chalov (CSKA Moscow) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 31, Corner awarded to CSKA Moscow.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Nayair Tiknizyan for CSKA Moscow who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Throw-in for Rostov in their own half.
Rostov awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 33, Rostov have a dangerous throw-in.
Rostov drives forward and Denis Hadzikadunic gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Rostov have a goal kick.
In the minute 35, Throw-in for Rostov in the half of CSKA Moscow.
CSKA Moscow advance rapidly upfield but Vladimir Moskalev blows for offside.
Vladimir Moskalev signals a free kick to CSKA Moscow in their own half.
In the minute 38, Fedor Chalov of CSKA Moscow gets in a strike, but is off target.
Vladimir Moskalev awards Rostov a goal kick.
CSKA Moscow awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 41, Rostov awarded a free kick in their own half.
CSKA Moscow are caught offside.
In the minute 42, Danila Sukhomlinov for Rostov drives towards goal at Rostov Arena. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Vladimir Moskalev signals a free kick to CSKA Moscow in their own half.
Dmitri Poloz (Rostov) has received a yellow card from Vladimir Moskalev.
Danila Sukhomlinov (Rostov) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 44, Nayair Tiknizyan of CSKA Moscow smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Vladimir Moskalev will wait an extra 2 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 1st half.
Free kick for CSKA Moscow in their own half.
In the minute 45, Free kick for CSKA Moscow in their own half.
Nikola Vlasic of CSKA Moscow gets in a strike, but is off target.
Goal kick for Rostov at Rostov Arena.
In the minute 45, The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
The second-half has just kicked-off.
In the minute 46, CSKA Moscow’s Nayair Tiknizyan is on his feet again at Rostov Arena.
In Rostov-on-Don CSKA Moscow drive forward through Alan Dzagoev. His shot is on target but it's saved.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
The home team have replaced Denis Terentjev with Aleksey Kozlov. This is the second substitution made today by Valeri Karpin.
In the minute 47, Rostov's Dmitri Poloz is whistled for offside at Rostov Arena.
Can Rostov capitalize from this throw-in deep inside CSKA Moscow's half?
In Rostov-on-Don a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 52, Rostov awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick Rostov.
Ball safe as CSKA Moscow is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 54, Free kick for Rostov in the half of CSKA Moscow.
Free kick CSKA Moscow.
Throw-in for CSKA Moscow close to the penalty box.
In the minute 56, Can CSKA Moscow get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Rostov's half?
Vladimir Moskalev signals a throw-in for CSKA Moscow, close to Rostov's area.
Great finish from Fedor Chalov to give CSKA Moscow a 0-2 lead.
In the minute 57, Alan Dzagoev with an assist there.
Throw-in for CSKA Moscow at Rostov Arena.
Rostov have been awarded a corner by Vladimir Moskalev.
In the minute 63, Throw-in for Rostov close to the penalty box.
CSKA Moscow pushes forward through Georgi Schennikov, whose finish on goal is saved.
CSKA Moscow have been awarded a corner by Vladimir Moskalev.
In the minute 67, CSKA Moscow's Nikola Vlasic gets in a shot on goal at Rostov Arena. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Vladimir Moskalev signals a CSKA Moscow throw-in in Rostov's half.
CSKA Moscow to take a throw-in in Rostov territory.
In the minute 68, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Vladimir Moskalev signals a free kick to CSKA Moscow.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for CSKA Moscow close to the penalty box.
In the minute 70, Rostov's Haitam Aleesami has been booked in Rostov-on-Don.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Rostov-on-Don to check on Mario Fernandes, who is grimacing with pain.
CSKA Moscow's Mario Fernandes is back in action after a slight knock.
In the minute 73, Khoren Bayramyan (Rostov) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Can Rostov capitalize from this throw-in deep inside CSKA Moscow's half?
Valeri Karpin (Rostov) is making a third substitution, with Danil Glebov replacing Armin Gigovic.
In the minute 73, Pontus Almqvist is replacing Khoren Bayramyan for Rostov at Rostov Arena.
Throw-in for Rostov in the half of CSKA Moscow.
Throw-in CSKA Moscow.
Can Rostov get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in CSKA Moscow's half?
In the minute 75, Viktor Goncharenko is making the team's first substitution at Rostov Arena with Kristijan Bistrovic replacing Alan Dzagoev.
In the minute 76, Free kick for Rostov in the half of CSKA Moscow.
CSKA Moscow have a dangerous throw-in.
Vladimir Moskalev waits before resuming play because Nikola Vlasic for CSKA Moscow is still down.
In the minute 78, Throw-in high up the field for CSKA Moscow in Rostov-on-Don.
Nikola Vlasic has recovered and rejoins the match in Rostov-on-Don.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Rostov-on-Don.
The match at Rostov Arena has been interrupted briefly for a check on Haitam Aleesami, who is down injured.
In the minute 78, Nikolay Poyarkov (Rostov) has replaced the possibly injured Haitam Aleesami.
Can CSKA Moscow capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
In the minute 82, Fedor Chalov heads in to give CSKA Moscow a 0-3 lead at Rostov Arena.
Kristijan Bistrovic instrumental with a fine assist.
Rostov are in shooting range from this free kick.
In the minute 85, Mario Fernandes for CSKA Moscow has been booked by Vladimir Moskalev and receives a first yellow card.
Viktor Goncharenko is making the team's second substitution at Rostov Arena with Arnor Sigurdsson replacing Chidera Ejuke.
Throw-in for CSKA Moscow at Rostov Arena.
In the minute 87, CSKA Moscow are pushing forward but Fedor Chalov's finish is wide of the goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Rostov goal kick.
In Rostov-on-Don a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 88, Roman Tugarev (Rostov) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
CSKA Moscow to take a throw-in in Rostov territory.
In Rostov-on-Don a free kick has been awarded the home team.
4 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Vladimir Moskalev signals a CSKA Moscow throw-in in Rostov's half.
Free kick for Rostov in their own half.
Throw-in for Rostov in the half of CSKA Moscow.
Ball safe as CSKA Moscow is awarded a throw-in in their half.
The second-half is over. The match ends 1-3.
CSKA Moscow's Arnor Sigurdsson has been booked in Rostov-on-Don.
Adolfo Gaich is replacing Fedor Chalov for the away team.
Goal! Aleksey Kozlov pulls one back to make it 1-3.
At Rostov Arena, Nikola Vlasic has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Adolfo Gaich for CSKA Moscow has been booked by Vladimir Moskalev and receives a first yellow card.
